name: Timothy for Change
description: Exploring the historical and economic roots of humanitarian crises across the Global South, from Palestine to the Sahel. The goal is to move beyond conventional charity and towards informed, meaningful support for community-led solutions.

links.title: GiveDirectly
links.description: A non-profit that sends money directly to people living in extreme poverty, letting them decide how to best improve their lives

links.title: ShareTheMeal
links.description: Quick and easy way to donate meals to children and families in crisis with just a few taps

links.title: WaterAid
links.description: An international non-profit working to make clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene normal for everyone, everywhere
